      • serverIps

      • hasAddress

        public boolean hasAddress(java.util.List<java.lang.String> ownIps,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> otherIps)
        Checks if the server is enumerated in its ip. By default address 127.0.0.1 is IGNORED.
        Parameters:
        ownIps - List of current servers ips.
        otherIps - List of other ips.
        Returns:
        True if the ip is present in other ips.

      • canConnect

        public boolean canConnect(java.lang.String ip)
        Checks if an IP is reachable.
        Parameters:
        ip - Ip to test.
        Returns:
        True if ip is reachable, false otherwise.

        public java.lang.String computerName()
        Finds the computer name.
        Returns:

        public java.util.Date minimumDate()
        Minimum date.
        Returns:

      • containsIp

        public boolean containsIp(java.lang.String ip)
        Determines if the server ip contains the given ip. Takes into account if the server is an old version.
        Parameters:
        ip - Current ip.
        Returns:
        True if the ip is within the list of server.
